mapper.insert: insert into board.board1 (board_title , memberid , board_content ) values (#{board_title},#{board_writer},#{board_content})
mapper.select: select board_idx, board_title , memberid , board_content , datetime , viewcnt from board.board1 order by board_idx desc limit #{displayPost}, #{postNum}

select board_idx, board_title , memberid , board_content , datetime , viewcnt from board.board1
where board_title like concat("%",#{keyword},"%")
where board_content like concat("%",#{keyword},"%")
where board_writer like concat("%",#{keyword},"%")
where board_content like concat("%",#{keyword},"%") or where board_title like concat("%",#{keyword},"%")
order by board_idx desc limit #{displayPost}, #{postNum}
